solution_line_template: There are {windows_downstairs} + {single_windows_upstairs} = <<{windows_downstairs}+{single_windows_upstairs}={total_windows}>>{total_windows} windows in the whole house
There are {total_windows} x {panels_per_window} = <<{total_windows}*{panels_per_window}={total_glass_panels}>>{total_glass_panels} glass panels in the whole house
